trans-unit.source: Creates a panel that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 有關聯的面板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel> is a member of its associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> rather than being a member of the underlying form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel>成員及其相關聯的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>而不是成員的基礎表單。

trans-unit.source: At design time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel> is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel>可透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> class with its specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> attaches to the edges of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 要如何附加至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 邊緣的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 是否會自動調整大小以顯示其全部內容。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> is automatically resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 會自動調整大小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> to shrink when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.AutoSize" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 為 <see langword="true" /> 時，讓 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.AutoSize" /> 縮小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> is docked to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 所停駐的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 邊緣。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.Dock" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.Dock" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing between the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> and its edges.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 和其邊緣之間的內部間距。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges" /> that represents the padding for all the edges of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges" />，表示停駐控制項所有邊緣的邊框距離。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 的高度，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The height cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> relative to the upper-left corner of its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相對於其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 左上角的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左上角座標。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that represents the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> relative to the upper-left corner of its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />，表示相對於其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 左上角的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.Location" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.Location" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the upper limit that <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> can specify.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> 可以指定的上限大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 類型的排序配對，代表矩形的寬度與高度。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size that is the lower limit that <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> can specify.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> 可以指定的下限大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 類型的排序配對，代表矩形的寬度與高度。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.

trans-unit.source: The width cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定寬度。

trans-unit.source: The name of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the name of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> that contains this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> that contains this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />，表示包含此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 的高度和寬度。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the height and width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 的高度和寬度的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tab order of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> within its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 在其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 中的定位順序。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> within the set of other <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> objects within its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> that are included in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 其他 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 物件集中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> 索引值，此物件集位於包含在定位順序中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 內。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否能使用 TAB 鍵，將焦點提供給這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can give the focus to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> using the TAB key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以使用 TAB 鍵將焦點提供給這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。
